trans-unit.source: Once the number of threads making use of a napi_threadsafe_function reaches zero, no further threads can start making use of it by calling napi_acquire_threadsafe_function(). In fact, all subsequent API calls associated with it, except napi_release_threadsafe_function(), will return an error value of napi_closing.

trans-unit.source: Once the socket is created, calling socket.bind() will instruct the socket to begin listening for datagram messages. When address and port are not passed to socket.bind() the method will bind the socket to the "all interfaces" address on a random port (it does the right thing for both udp4 and udp6 sockets). The bound address and port can be retrieved using socket.address().address and socket.address().port.
trans-unit.target: 创建套接字后，调用 socket.bind() 将指示套接字开始侦听数据报消息。当 address 和 port 未传递到 socket.bind() 时,该方法会将套接字绑定到随机端口上的“所有接口”地址（对于 udp4 和 udp6 套接字都做正确的事情）。可以使用 socket.address().address 和 socket.address().port 检索绑定的地址和端口。

trans-unit.source: Once the source code has been written, it must be compiled into the binary addon.node file. This file is used by node-gyp — a tool written specifically to compile Node.js Addons.
trans-unit.target: 编写源代码后，必须将其编译到二进制 addon.node 文件中。为此，请在项目的顶层创建一个名为 binding.gyp 的文件，该文件使用类似JSON的格式描述模块的构建配置。该文件由node-gyp使用，node-gyp是专门编写用于编译Node.js插件的工具。

trans-unit.source: Once the total size of the internal read buffer reaches the threshold specified by highWaterMark, the stream will temporarily stop reading data from the underlying resource until the data currently buffered can be consumed (that is, the stream will stop calling the internal readable._read() method that is used to fill the read buffer).
trans-unit.target: 一旦内部读取缓冲区的总大小达到 highWaterMark 指定的阈值，流将暂时停止从底层资源读取数据，直到可以使用当前缓冲的数据为止（也就是说，流将停止调用内部 readable._read() 用于填充读取缓冲区的方法）。

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: PKCS#1, SEC1, and PKCS#8 type keys can be encrypted by using a combination of the cipher and format options. The PKCS#8 type can be used with any format to encrypt any key algorithm (RSA, EC, or DH) by specifying a cipher. PKCS#1 and SEC1 can only be encrypted by specifying a cipher when the PEM format is used. For maximum compatibility, use PKCS#8 for encrypted private keys. Since PKCS#8 defines its own encryption mechanism, PEM-level encryption is not supported when encrypting a PKCS#8 key. See RFC 5208 for PKCS#8 encryption and RFC 1421 for PKCS#1 and SEC1 encryption.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 cipher 和 format 选项的组合来加密PKCS＃1，SEC1和PKCS＃8类型的密钥。 PKCS＃8 type 可以通过指定 cipher 以任何 format 用于加密任何密钥算法（RSA，EC或DH）。使用PEM format 时，只能通过指定 cipher 来加密PKCS＃1和SEC1 。为了获得最大的兼容性，请对加密的私钥使用PKCS＃8。由于PKCS＃8定义了自己的加密机制，因此在加密PKCS＃8密钥时不支持PEM级加密。有关PKCS＃8加密，请参阅RFC 5208；有关PKCS＃1和SEC1加密，请参阅RFC 1421。

trans-unit.source: Passing a number as the first argument to Buffer() (e.g. new Buffer(10)) allocates a new Buffer object of the specified size. Prior to Node.js 8.0.0, the memory allocated for such Buffer instances is not initialized and can contain sensitive data. Such Buffer instances must be subsequently initialized by using either buf.fill(0) or by writing to the entire Buffer. While this behavior is intentional to improve performance, development experience has demonstrated that a more explicit distinction is required between creating a fast-but-uninitialized Buffer versus creating a slower-but-safer Buffer. Since Node.js 8.0.0, Buffer(num) and new Buffer(num) return a Buffer with initialized memory.
trans-unit.target: 将数字作为第一个参数传递给 Buffer() （例如 new Buffer(10) ）将分配指定大小的新 Buffer 对象。在Node.js 8.0.0之前，为此类 Buffer 实例分配的内存未初始化，并且可以包含敏感数据。随后必须使用 buf.fill(0) 或写入整个 Buffer 来初始化此类 Buffer 实例。尽管此行为是有意改善性能的，但开发经验表明，在创建快速但未初始化的对象之间需要更明确的区别 Buffer 与创建速度较慢但更安全的 Buffer 相比。从Node.js 8.0.0开始， Buffer(num) 和 new Buffer(num) 返回带有初始化内存的 Buffer 。

trans-unit.source: Paths specified using a Buffer are useful primarily on certain POSIX operating systems that treat file paths as opaque byte sequences. On such systems, it is possible for a single file path to contain sub-sequences that use multiple character encodings. As with string paths, Buffer paths may be relative or absolute:
trans-unit.target: 使用 Buffer 指定的路径主要在某些POSIX操作系统上有用，这些操作系统将文件路径视为不透明字节序列。在这样的系统上，单个文件路径可能包含使用多种字符编码的子序列。与字符串路径一样， Buffer 路径可以是相对的或绝对的：

trans-unit.source: Pauses the reading of data. That is, 'data' events will not be emitted. Useful to throttle back an upload.
trans-unit.target: 暂停数据读取。也就是说， 'data' 事件将不会发出。有助于取消上传。

trans-unit.source: Pending deprecations are generally identical to a runtime deprecation with the notable exception that they are turned off by default and will not be emitted unless either the --pending-deprecation command line flag, or the NODE_PENDING_DEPRECATION=1 environment variable, is set. Pending deprecations are used to provide a kind of selective "early warning" mechanism that developers may leverage to detect deprecated API usage.
trans-unit.target: 暂挂弃用通常与运行时弃用相同，但值得注意的例外是它们默认情况下处于关闭状态，除非设置了 --pending-deprecation 命令行标志或 NODE_PENDING_DEPRECATION=1 环境变量，否则它们不会发出。待使用的弃用项用于提供一种选择性的“预警”机制，开发人员可以利用该机制来检测已弃用的API使用情况。

trans-unit.source: Perfect Forward Secrecy
trans-unit.target: 完美的前向保密性

trans-unit.source: Perfect Forward Secrecy is achieved by randomly generating a key pair for key-agreement on every TLS/SSL handshake (in contrast to using the same key for all sessions). Methods implementing this technique are called "ephemeral".
trans-unit.target: 完美前向保密是通过在每次TLS/SSL握手时随机生成一个密钥对用于密钥约定来实现的(与在所有会话中使用同一密钥相反)。实现这种技术的方法被称为 "历时性"。

trans-unit.source: Perfect Forward Secrecy was optional up to TLSv1.2, but it is not optional for TLSv1.3, because all TLSv1.3 cipher suites use ECDHE.
trans-unit.target: 完美前向保密在TLSv1.2之前是可选的,但在TLSv1.3中不是可选的,因为所有TLSv1.3密码套件都使用ECDHE。

trans-unit.source: Policies
trans-unit.target: Policies

trans-unit.source: Policies are a security feature intended to allow guarantees about what code Node.js is able to load. The use of policies assumes safe practices for the policy files such as ensuring that policy files cannot be overwritten by the Node.js application by using file permissions.
trans-unit.target: 策略是一种安全特性,旨在允许保证Node.js能够加载哪些代码。使用策略的前提是对策略文件进行安全实践,比如确保策略文件不能被Node.js应用通过使用文件权限覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Policy files must use integrity checks with Subresource Integrity strings compatible with the browser integrity attribute associated with absolute URLs.
trans-unit.target: 策略文件必须将完整性检查与与绝对URL关联的浏览器完整性属性兼容的子资源完整性字符串一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Pooled connections have TCP Keep-Alive enabled for them, but servers may still close idle connections, in which case they will be removed from the pool and a new connection will be made when a new HTTP request is made for that host and port. Servers may also refuse to allow multiple requests over the same connection, in which case the connection will have to be remade for every request and cannot be pooled. The Agent will still make the requests to that server, but each one will occur over a new connection.
trans-unit.target: 池连接为它们启用了TCP Keep-Alive，但是服务器仍可以关闭空闲连接，在这种情况下，它们将从池中删除，并且当对该主机和端口发出新的HTTP请求时将建立新连接。服务器也可能拒绝在同一连接上允许多个请求，在这种情况下，必须为每个请求重新建立连接，并且不能将其合并。该 Agent 仍然会发出请求到该服务器，但每个人都会发生在一个新的连接。

trans-unit.source: Positive integer - The integer value is interpreted as a file descriptor that is currently open in the parent process. It is shared with the child process, similar to how <Stream> objects can be shared. Passing sockets is not supported on Windows.
trans-unit.target: 正整数-整数值被解释为当前在父进程中打开的文件描述符。它与子进程共享，类似于可以共享<Stream>对象的方式。Windows不支持传递套接字。

trans-unit.source: Previous versions of Node.js exposed handles to internal native objects through the _handle property of the Cipher, Decipher, DiffieHellman, DiffieHellmanGroup, ECDH, Hash, Hmac, Sign, and Verify classes. The _handle property has been removed because improper use of the native object can lead to crashing the application.
trans-unit.target: _handle 版本的Node.js通过 Cipher ， Decipher ， DiffieHellman ， DiffieHellmanGroup ， ECDH ， Hash ， Hmac ， Sign 和 Verify 类的_handle属性将句柄公开给内部本地对象。该 _handle 属性已被删除，因为不当使用原生对象的可导致崩溃的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Previous versions of Node.js supported dns.lookup() with a falsy hostname like dns.lookup(false) due to backward compatibility. This behavior is undocumented and is thought to be unused in real world apps. It will become an error in future versions of Node.js.

trans-unit.source: Prior to Node.js 0.12, the ctime held the birthtime on Windows systems. As of 0.12, ctime is not "creation time", and on Unix systems, it never was.

trans-unit.source: Prior to Node.js 8.0.0, the underlying memory for Buffer instances created in this way is not initialized. The contents of a newly created Buffer are unknown and may contain sensitive data. Use Buffer.alloc(size) instead to initialize a Buffer with zeroes.
trans-unit.target: 在Node.js 8.0.0之前，未初始化以此方式创建的 Buffer 实例的基础内存。新创建的 Buffer 的内容是未知的，并且可能包含敏感数据。使用 Buffer.alloc(size) 代替初始化为零的 Buffer 。

trans-unit.source: Prior to the introduction of TypedArray, the JavaScript language had no mechanism for reading or manipulating streams of binary data. The Buffer class was introduced as part of the Node.js API to enable interaction with octet streams in TCP streams, file system operations, and other contexts.
trans-unit.target: 在引入 TypedArray 之前，JavaScript语言没有用于读取或操纵二进制数据流的机制。该 Buffer 类被引入作为Node.js的API来实现与八位字节流中的TCP流，文件系统操作，以及其他环境交互的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Prior versions of Node.js required the use of the --trace-events-enabled flag to enable trace events. This requirement has been removed. However, the --trace-events-enabled flag may still be used and will enable the node, node.async_hooks, and v8 trace event categories by default.
trans-unit.target: 早期版本的Node.js需要使用 --trace-events-enabled 标志来启用跟踪事件。此要求已被删除。但是，-- --trace-events-enabled 标志可能仍会使用，并且将默认启用 node ， node.async_hooks 和 v8 跟踪事件类别。

trans-unit.source: Provided require.cache is not modified, multiple calls to require('foo') will not cause the module code to be executed multiple times. This is an important feature. With it, "partially done" objects can be returned, thus allowing transitive dependencies to be loaded even when they would cause cycles.
trans-unit.target: 如果 require.cache 没有被修改，则对 require('foo') 的多次调用不会导致模块代码被多次执行。这是一个重要功能。使用它，可以返回“部分完成”的对象，从而即使在可能导致循环的情况下，也可以加载传递依赖。

trans-unit.source: Provides a synchronous scrypt implementation. Scrypt is a password-based key derivation function that is designed to be expensive computationally and memory-wise in order to make brute-force attacks unrewarding.
trans-unit.target: 提供同步scrypt实现。Scrypt是基于密码的密钥派生功能，其功能在计算和内存方面都非常昂贵，目的是使暴力攻击无法获得回报。

trans-unit.source: Provides a synchronous Password-Based Key Derivation Function 2 (PBKDF2) implementation. A selected HMAC digest algorithm specified by digest is applied to derive a key of the requested byte length (keylen) from the password, salt and iterations.
trans-unit.target: 提供基于密码的同步密钥派生功能2（PBKDF2）实现。由指定的选择HMAC摘要算法 digest 被施加以导出所请求的字节长度（的键 keylen 从） password ， salt 和 iterations 。

trans-unit.target: 提供异步scrypt实现。Scrypt是基于密码的密钥派生功能，其功能在计算和内存方面都非常昂贵，目的是使暴力攻击无法获得回报。

trans-unit.source: Provides an asynchronous Password-Based Key Derivation Function 2 (PBKDF2) implementation. A selected HMAC digest algorithm specified by digest is applied to derive a key of the requested byte length (keylen) from the password, salt and iterations.

trans-unit.source: Pushing a zero-byte string, Buffer or Uint8Array to a stream that is not in object mode has an interesting side effect. Because it is a call to readable.push(), the call will end the reading process. However, because the argument is an empty string, no data is added to the readable buffer so there is nothing for a user to consume.
trans-unit.target: 将零字节的字符串， Buffer 或 Uint8Array 推送到不在对象模式下的流中会产生有趣的副作用。因为它是对 readable.push() 的调用，所以该调用将结束读取过程。但是，由于参数是一个空字符串，因此不会将任何数据添加到可读缓冲区，因此用户没有任何消耗量。

trans-unit.source: References can be created with an initial reference count. The count can then be modified through napi_reference_ref and napi_reference_unref. If an object is collected while the count for a reference is 0, all subsequent calls to get the object associated with the reference napi_get_reference_value will return NULL for the returned napi_value. An attempt to call napi_reference_ref for a reference whose object has been collected will result in an error.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用初始参考计数创建参考。然后可以通过 napi_reference_ref 和 napi_reference_unref 修改计数。如果一个对象被收集而引用计数为0，所有后续调用获得与参考相关联的对象 napi_get_reference_value 将返回NULL的返回 napi_value 。尝试调用 napi_reference_ref 以获得其对象已被收集的引用，将导致错误。

trans-unit.source: References must be deleted once they are no longer required by the addon. When a reference is deleted it will no longer prevent the corresponding object from being collected. Failure to delete a persistent reference will result in a 'memory leak' with both the native memory for the persistent reference and the corresponding object on the heap being retained forever.
trans-unit.target: 一旦addon不再需要引用,就必须删除它们。当一个引用被删除时,它将不再阻止相应对象被收集。如果不删除一个持久性引用,将导致 "内存泄漏",持久性引用的本机内存和堆上的对应对象都将被永远保留。

trans-unit.source: References to __filename within b.js will return /Users/mjr/app/node_modules/b/b.js while references to __filename within a.js will return /Users/mjr/app/a.js.

trans-unit.target: 返回一个 Proxy 对象，该代理对象充当 net.Socket （或 tls.TLSSocket ），但将可用方法限制为可以与HTTP / 2一起安全使用的方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns a net.Server instance that creates and manages Http2Session instances.
trans-unit.target: 返回 net.Server 创建和管理实例 Http2Session 实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns a tls.Server instance that creates and manages Http2Session instances.
trans-unit.target: 返回 tls.Server 创建和管理实例 Http2Session 实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns a JSON representation of buf. JSON.stringify() implicitly calls this function when stringifying a Buffer instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回 buf 的JSON表示形式。在对 Buffer 实例进行字符串化时， JSON.stringify() 隐式调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a JavaScript Object representation of a diagnostic report for the running process. The report's JavaScript stack trace is taken from err, if present.
trans-unit.target: 返回正在运行的过程的诊断报告的JavaScript对象表示形式。该报告的JavaScript堆栈跟踪来自 err （如果存在）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a comma-separated list of all currently-enabled trace event categories. The current set of enabled trace event categories is determined by the union of all currently-enabled Tracing objects and any categories enabled using the --trace-event-categories flag.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有当前启用的跟踪事件类别的逗号分隔列表。当前启用的跟踪事件类别的集合由所有当前启用的 Tracing 对象与使用 --trace-event-categories 标志启用的任何类别的并集确定。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of the array of listeners for the event named eventName, including any wrappers (such as those created by .once()).
trans-unit.target: 返回名为 eventName 的事件的侦听器数组的副本，包括所有包装（例如 .once() 创建的包装）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of the array of listeners for the event named eventName.
trans-unit.target: 返回名为 eventName 的事件的侦听器数组的副本。

trans-unit.source: Returns a customizable serialization of a URL String representation of a WHATWG URL object.
trans-unit.target: 返回WHATWG URL对象的URL String 表示形式的可自定义序列化。

trans-unit.source: Returns a decoded string, ensuring that any incomplete multibyte characters at the end of the Buffer, or TypedArray, or DataView are omitted from the returned string and stored in an internal buffer for the next call to stringDecoder.write() or stringDecoder.end().
trans-unit.target: 返回已解码的字符串，确保返回的字符串中省略了 Buffer ， TypedArray 或 DataView 末尾的任何不完整的多字节字符，并将其存储在内部缓冲区中，以供下次调用 stringDecoder.write() 或 stringDecoder.end() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of PerformanceEntry objects in chronological order with respect to performanceEntry.startTime whose performanceEntry.entryType is equal to type.
trans-unit.target: 返回列表 PerformanceEntry 按时间顺序对象相对于 performanceEntry.startTime 其 performanceEntry.entryType 等于 type 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of PerformanceEntry objects in chronological order with respect to performanceEntry.startTime whose performanceEntry.name is equal to name, and optionally, whose performanceEntry.entryType is equal to type.
trans-unit.target: 返回的列表 PerformanceEntry 按时间顺序的对象相对于 performanceEntry.startTime 其 performanceEntry.name 等于 name ，以及任选地，它的 performanceEntry.entryType 等于 type 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of PerformanceEntry objects in chronological order with respect to performanceEntry.startTime.
trans-unit.target: 返回列表 PerformanceEntry 按时间顺序对象相对于 performanceEntry.startTime 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new Buffer that references the same memory as the original, but offset and cropped by the start and end indices.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的 Buffer ，该Buffer引用与原始内存相同的内存，但是由 start 和 end 索引偏移并裁剪。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new Buffer which is the result of concatenating all the Buffer instances in the list together.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的 Buffer ，它是将 list 所有 Buffer 实例连接在一起的结果。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of http.Server.
trans-unit.target: 返回 http.Server 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to the EventEmitter, so that calls can be chained.
trans-unit.target: 返回对 EventEmitter 的引用，以便可以链接调用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to the Http2ServerResponse, so that calls can be chained.
trans-unit.target: 返回对 Http2ServerResponse 的引用，以便可以链接调用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to the ServerResponse, so that calls can be chained.
trans-unit.target: 返回对 ServerResponse 的引用，以便可以链接调用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a shallow copy of the current outgoing headers. Since a shallow copy is used, array values may be mutated without additional calls to various header-related http module methods. The keys of the returned object are the header names and the values are the respective header values. All header names are lowercase.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前出站头的浅层拷贝。由于使用的是浅层拷贝,因此数组值可以在不调用各种与头相关的http模块方法的情况下进行突变。返回对象的键是头名,值是各自的头值。所有头名都是小写的。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing the negotiated SSL/TLS protocol version of the current connection. The value 'unknown' will be returned for connected sockets that have not completed the handshaking process. The value null will be returned for server sockets or disconnected client sockets.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，其中包含当前连接的协商的SSL / TLS协议版本。对于尚未完成握手过程的已连接套接字，将返回值 'unknown' 。对于服务器套接字或断开连接的客户端套接字，将返回 null 值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string identifying the current Punycode.js version number.
trans-unit.target: 返回标识当前Punycode.js版本号的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns an ES6 Iterator over each of the name-value pairs in the query string. Each item of the iterator is a JavaScript Array. The first item of the Array is the name, the second item of the Array is the value.
trans-unit.target: 在查询字符串中的每个名称/值对上返回一个ES6 Iterator 。迭代器的每一项都是一个JavaScript Array 。所述的第一项 Array 是 name ，则第二项 Array 是 value 。

trans-unit.source: Returns an ES6 Iterator over each of the name-value pairs in the query. Each item of the iterator is a JavaScript Array. The first item of the Array is the name, the second item of the Array is the value.
trans-unit.target: 在查询中的每个名称/值对上返回一个ES6 Iterator 。迭代器的每一项都是一个JavaScript Array 。所述的第一项 Array 是 name ，则第二项 Array 是 value 。

trans-unit.source: Returns an ES6 Iterator over the names of each name-value pair.
trans-unit.target: 返回每个名称/值对的名称上的ES6 Iterator 。

trans-unit.source: Returns an ES6 Iterator over the values of each name-value pair.
trans-unit.target: 返回每个名称/值对的值的ES6 Iterator 。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array containing the paths searched during resolution of request or null if the request string references a core module, for example http or fs.
trans-unit.target: 返回的解析过程中搜索包含所述路径的数组 request 或 null ，如果 request 的字符串的引用的芯模块，例如 http 或 fs 。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array containing the unique names of the current outgoing headers. All header names are lowercase.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个数组,该数组中包含当前发出的报头的唯一名称。所有头文件名都是小写的。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array listing the events for which the emitter has registered listeners. The values in the array will be strings or Symbols.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个数组，该数组列出发射器已为其注册侦听器的事件。数组中的值将是字符串或 Symbol 。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of IP address strings, formatted according to RFC 5952, that are currently configured for DNS resolution. A string will include a port section if a custom port is used.
trans-unit.target: 返回IP地址字符串的数组，该字符串根据RFC 5952进行了格式化，当前已配置用于DNS解析。如果使用自定义端口，则字符串将包含端口部分。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array with the names of the supported TLS ciphers. The names are lower-case for historical reasons, but must be uppercased to be used in the ciphers option of tls.createSecureContext().
trans-unit.target: 返回带有支持的TLS密码名称的数组。由于历史原因，名称是小写的，但必须在 tls.createSecureContext() 的 ciphers 选项中使用大写。

trans-unit.source: Returns an integer representing a "version tag" derived from the V8 version, command line flags and detected CPU features. This is useful for determining whether a vm.ScriptcachedData buffer is compatible with this instance of V8.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个整数，该整数表示从V8版本，命令行标志和检测到的CPU功能派生的“版本标签”。这对于确定 vm.Script cachedData 缓冲区是否与此V8实例兼容非常有用。

trans-unit.source: Returns an integer representing the file descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 返回代表文件描述符的整数。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object containing commonly used constants for file system operations. The specific constants currently defined are described in FS Constants.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含文件系统操作常用常量的对象。当前定义的特定常量在FS常量中进行了描述。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object containing commonly used operating system specific constants for error codes, process signals, and so on. The specific constants currently defined are described in OS Constants.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个对象，其中包含错误代码，过程信号等的常用操作系统特定常数。当前定义的特定常量在OS常量中进行了描述。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object containing information on the negotiated cipher suite.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含协商的密码套件信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object containing the address, family, and port of the remote endpoint. It throws an ERR_SOCKET_DGRAM_NOT_CONNECTED exception if the socket is not connected.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含远程端点的 address ， family 和 port 的对象。如果未连接套接字，则抛出 ERR_SOCKET_DGRAM_NOT_CONNECTED 异常。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object containing the address information for a socket. For UDP sockets, this object will contain address, family and port properties.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含套接字地址信息的对象。对于UDP套接字，此对象将包含 address ， family 和 port 属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object containing the default settings for an Http2Session instance. This method returns a new object instance every time it is called so instances returned may be safely modified for use.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个对象，其中包含 Http2Session 实例的默认设置。每次调用此方法都会返回一个新的对象实例，因此可以安全地修改返回的实例以供使用。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object representing the local certificate. The returned object has some properties corresponding to the fields of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个代表本地证书的对象。返回的对象有一些与证书字段对应的属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object representing the peer's certificate. If the peer does not provide a certificate, an empty object will be returned. If the socket has been destroyed, null will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示对等方证书的对象。如果对等方不提供证书，则将返回一个空对象。如果套接字已被销毁，则将返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object representing the type, name, and size of parameter of an ephemeral key exchange in Perfect Forward Secrecy on a client connection. It returns an empty object when the key exchange is not ephemeral. As this is only supported on a client socket; null is returned if called on a server socket. The supported types are 'DH' and 'ECDH'. The name property is available only when type is 'ECDH'.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个对象，该对象表示客户端连接上“ Perfect Forward Secrecy”中临时密钥交换的参数的类型，名称和大小。当密钥交换不是临时的时，它将返回一个空对象。因为这仅在客户端套接字上受支持；如果在服务器套接字上调用，则返回 null 。支持的类型为 'DH' 和 'ECDH' 。仅当类型为 'ECDH' 时， name 属性才可用。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object with the following properties:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个具有以下属性的对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns an un-pooled Buffer.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个非池化的 Buffer 。

trans-unit.source: Returns any remaining input stored in the internal buffer as a string. Bytes representing incomplete UTF-8 and UTF-16 characters will be replaced with substitution characters appropriate for the character encoding.
trans-unit.target: 返回存储在内部缓冲区中的剩余输入字符,作为一个字符串。代表不完整的UTF-8和UTF-16字符的字节将被适合字符编码的替换字符所取代。

trans-unit.source: Returns statistics about the V8 heap spaces, i.e. the segments which make up the V8 heap. Neither the ordering of heap spaces, nor the availability of a heap space can be guaranteed as the statistics are provided via the V8 GetHeapSpaceStatistics function and may change from one V8 version to the next.
trans-unit.target: 返回有关V8堆空间的统计信息，即构成V8堆的段。由于统计信息是通过V8 GetHeapSpaceStatistics 函数提供的，因此不能保证堆空间的排序或堆空间的可用性，并且可能会从一个V8版本更改为另一个版本。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Punycode ASCII serialization of the domain. If domain is an invalid domain, the empty string is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回 domain 的Punycode ASCII序列化。如果 domain 是无效的域，则返回空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Diffie-Hellman generator in the specified encoding. If encoding is provided a string is returned; otherwise a Buffer is returned.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的 encoding 返回Diffie-Hellman生成器。如果提供了 encoding 则返回一个字符串。否则返回 Buffer 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Diffie-Hellman prime in the specified encoding. If encoding is provided a string is returned; otherwise a Buffer is returned.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的 encoding 返回Diffie-Hellman质数。如果提供了 encoding 则返回一个字符串。否则返回 Buffer 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Diffie-Hellman private key in the specified encoding. If encoding is provided a string is returned; otherwise a Buffer is returned.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的 encoding 返回Diffie-Hellman私钥。如果提供了 encoding 则返回一个字符串。否则返回 Buffer 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Diffie-Hellman public key in the specified encoding. If encoding is provided a string is returned; otherwise a Buffer is returned.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的 encoding 返回Diffie-Hellman公钥。如果提供了 encoding 则返回一个字符串。否则返回 Buffer 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the TLS session data or undefined if no session was negotiated. On the client, the data can be provided to the session option of tls.connect() to resume the connection. On the server, it may be useful for debugging.
trans-unit.target: 返回TLS会话数据，如果未协商任何会话，则返回 undefined 。在客户端上，可以将数据提供给 tls.connect() 的 session 选项以恢复连接。在服务器上，它可能对调试很有用。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Unicode serialization of the domain. If domain is an invalid domain, the empty string is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回 domain 的Unicode序列化。如果 domain 是无效的域，则返回空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns the actual byte length of a string. This is not the same as String.prototype.length since that returns the number of characters in a string.
trans-unit.target: 返回字符串的实际字节长度。这是不一样的 String.prototype.length ，因为它返回的数字符的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns the amount of memory allocated for buf in bytes. This does not necessarily reflect the amount of "usable" data within buf.
trans-unit.target: 返回为 buf 分配的内存量（以字节为单位）。这不一定反映出 buf 中“可用”数据的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the bound address, the address family name and port of the socket as reported by the operating system: { port: 12346, family: 'IPv4', address: '127.0.0.1' }
trans-unit.target: 返回绑定的 address ，操作系统报告的套接字的地址 family 名称和 port ： { port: 12346, family: 'IPv4', address: '127.0.0.1' }

trans-unit.source: Returns the bound address, the address family name, and port of the server as reported by the operating system if listening on an IP socket (useful to find which port was assigned when getting an OS-assigned address): { port: 12346, family: 'IPv4', address: '127.0.0.1' }.
trans-unit.target: 如果在IP套接字上侦听，则返回操作系统报告的服务器的绑定 address ，地址 family 名称和 port （在获取OS分配的地址时很有用，以找到分配给哪个端口）： { port: 12346, family: 'IPv4', address: '127.0.0.1' } 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the bound address, the address family name, and port of the underlying socket as reported by the operating system: { port: 12346, family: 'IPv4', address: '127.0.0.1' }.
trans-unit.target: 返回绑定的 address ，地址 family 名称， port 底层套接字的所报告的操作系统： { port: 12346, family: 'IPv4', address: '127.0.0.1' } 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the bound address, the address family name, and port of the server as reported by the operating system. See net.Server.address() for more information.
trans-unit.target: 返回操作系统报告的绑定地址，地址系列名称和服务器端口。有关更多信息，请参见 net.Server.address() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the contents of the path.
trans-unit.target: 返回 path 的内容。

trans-unit.source: Returns the created folder path.
trans-unit.target: 返回创建的文件夹路径。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current high resolution millisecond timestamp, where 0 represents the start of the current node process.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前的高分辨率毫秒时间戳，其中0表示当前 node 进程的开始。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current max listener value for the EventEmitter which is either set by emitter.setMaxListeners(n) or defaults to EventEmitter.defaultMaxListeners.
trans-unit.target: 返回 EventEmitter 的当前最大侦听器值，该值可以由 emitter.setMaxListeners(n) 设置，或者默认为 EventEmitter.defaultMaxListeners 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current number of concurrent connections on the server.
trans-unit.target: 返回服务器上当前的并发连接数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the maximum number of bytes that will be returned when buf.inspect() is called. This can be overridden by user modules. See util.inspect() for more details on buf.inspect() behavior.
trans-unit.target: 返回调用 buf.inspect() 时将返回的最大字节数。可以由用户模块覆盖。有关 util.inspect() buf.inspect() 行为的更多详细信息，请参见util.inspect（）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of bytesRead.
trans-unit.target: 返回 bytesRead 的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of listeners listening to the event named eventName.
trans-unit.target: 返回侦听名为 eventName 的事件的侦听器的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the numeric representation of the local port.
trans-unit.target: 返回本地端口的数字表示。

trans-unit.source: Returns the numeric representation of the remote port. For example, 443.
trans-unit.target: 返回远程端口的数字表示形式。例如 443 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the process identifier (PID) of the child process.
trans-unit.target: 返回子进程的进程标识符(PID)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the reason why the peer's certificate was not been verified. This property is set only when tlsSocket.authorized === false.
trans-unit.target: 返回未验证对等方证书的原因。仅当 tlsSocket.authorized === false 时才设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the resolved pathname.
trans-unit.target: 返回解析后的路径名。

trans-unit.source: Returns the search parameters serialized as a string, with characters percent-encoded where necessary.
trans-unit.target: 返回以字符串形式序列化的搜索参数,必要时使用百分比编码的字符。

trans-unit.source: Returns the session ticket keys.
trans-unit.target: Returns the session ticket keys.

trans-unit.source: Returns the stored internal buffer. This serializer should not be used once the buffer is released. Calling this method results in undefined behavior if a previous write has failed.
trans-unit.target: 返回存储的内部缓冲区。一旦缓冲区被释放,就不应该使用这个序列器。如果之前的写入失败,调用本方法会导致未定义的行为。

trans-unit.source: Returns the string name for a numeric error code that comes from a Node.js API. The mapping between error codes and error names is platform-dependent. See Common System Errors for the names of common errors.
trans-unit.target: 返回来自Node.js API的数字错误代码的字符串名称。错误代码和错误名称之间的映射取决于平台。有关常见错误的名称，请参见“ 常见系统错误 ”。

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of the local IP address.
trans-unit.target: 返回本地IP地址的字符串表示。

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of the remote IP address. For example, '74.125.127.100' or '2001:4860:a005::68'.
trans-unit.target: 返回远程IP地址的字符串表示形式。例如，“ '74.125.127.100' 或 '2001:4860:a005::68' 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of the remote IP family. 'IPv4' or 'IPv6'.
trans-unit.target: 返回远程IP系列的字符串表示形式。 'IPv4' 或 'IPv6' 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value at the given percentile.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定百分位的数值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of highWaterMark passed when constructing this Readable.
trans-unit.target: 返回构造此 Readable 时传递的 highWaterMark 的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the first name-value pair whose name is name. If there are no such pairs, null is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回名称为 name 的第一个名称-值对的值。如果没有这样的对，则返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the values of all name-value pairs whose name is name. If there are no such pairs, an empty array is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回名称为 name 的所有名称-值对的值。如果没有这样的对，则返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns:
trans-unit.target: Returns:

trans-unit.source: Returns: <AsyncHook> A reference to asyncHook.
trans-unit.target: 返回：<AsyncHook>对 asyncHook 的引用。

trans-unit.source: Returns: <AsyncHook> Instance used for disabling and enabling hooks
trans-unit.target: 返回：<AsyncHook>用于禁用和启用挂钩的实例

trans-unit.source: Returns: <AsyncResource> A reference to asyncResource.
trans-unit.target: 返回：<AsyncResource>对 asyncResource 的引用。

trans-unit.source: Returns: <Buffer>
trans-unit.target: 返回：<Buffer>

trans-unit.source: Returns: <Buffer> A 48-byte buffer containing the session ticket keys.
trans-unit.target: 返回：<Buffer>一个48字节的缓冲区，其中包含会话票证密钥。

trans-unit.source: Returns: <Buffer> A new Buffer with the decrypted content.
trans-unit.target: 返回：<Buffer>一个具有解密内容的新 Buffer 。

trans-unit.source: Returns: <Buffer> A new Buffer with the encrypted content.
trans-unit.target: 返回：<Buffer>具有加密内容的新 Buffer 。

trans-unit.source: Returns: <Buffer> A reference to buf.
trans-unit.target: 返回：<Buffer>对 buf 的引用。

trans-unit.source: Returns: <Buffer> The challenge component of the spkac data structure, which includes a public key and a challenge.
trans-unit.target: 返回：<Buffer> spkac 数据结构的质询组件，其中包括公用密钥和质询。

trans-unit.source: Returns: <Buffer> The public key component of the spkac data structure, which includes a public key and a challenge.

trans-unit.source: Running Node.js will now share port 8000 between the workers:
trans-unit.target: 运行的Node.js现在将在工作者之间共享8000端口。

trans-unit.source: Running Node.js with tracing enabled will produce log files that can be opened in the chrome://tracing tab of Chrome.
trans-unit.target: 在启用了跟踪的情况下运行Node.js将会生成日志文件，这些文件可以在Chrome 的 chrome://tracing 标签中打开。

trans-unit.source: Running this application from the command line will start a REPL on stdin. Other REPL clients may connect through the Unix socket or TCP socket. telnet, for instance, is useful for connecting to TCP sockets, while socat can be used to connect to both Unix and TCP sockets.
trans-unit.target: 从命令行运行此应用程序将在stdin上启动REPL。其他REPL客户端可以通过Unix套接字或TCP套接字进行连接。例如， telnet 可用于连接到TCP套接字，而 socat 可用于连接到Unix和TCP套接字。

trans-unit.source: Runs the compiled code contained by the vm.Script object within the given contextifiedSandbox and returns the result. Running code does not have access to local scope.
trans-unit.target: 在给定的 contextifiedSandbox 中运行 vm.Script 对象包含的已编译代码，并返回结果。正在运行的代码无权访问本地范围。

trans-unit.source: Runs the compiled code contained by the vm.Script within the context of the current global object. Running code does not have access to local scope, but does have access to the current global object.
trans-unit.target: 在当前 global 对象的上下文中运行 vm.Script 包含的已编译代码。运行代码不能访问本地范围，但确实有机会获得当前 global 对象。

trans-unit.source: See: Child Process module.

trans-unit.source: Send a message to a worker or master, optionally with a handle.
trans-unit.target: 向工人或主站发送消息,可选择使用句柄。

trans-unit.source: Send a message to the worker that will be received via require('worker_threads').parentPort.on('message'). See port.postMessage() for more details.
trans-unit.target: 发送一条消息给worker，将通过 require('worker_threads').parentPort.on('message') 。有关更多详细信息，请参见 port.postMessage() 。

trans-unit.source: Sending a 'Connection: keep-alive' will notify Node.js that the connection to the server should be persisted until the next request.
trans-unit.target: 发送 "Connection:keep-alive "将通知Node.js,与服务器的连接应该持续到下一个请求。

trans-unit.source: Sending a 'Content-Length' header will disable the default chunked encoding.
trans-unit.target: 发送 "Content-Length "头将禁用默认的分块编码。

trans-unit.source: Sending a message to the child process failed.
trans-unit.target: 向子进程发送消息失败。

trans-unit.source: Sending an 'Expect' header will immediately send the request headers. Usually, when sending 'Expect: 100-continue', both a timeout and a listener for the 'continue' event should be set. See RFC 2616 Section 8.2.3 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 发送“期望”标头将立即发送请求标头。通常，在发送“期望：100-继续”时，应同时设置超时和 'continue' 事件的侦听器。有关更多信息，请参见RFC 2616第8.2.3节。

trans-unit.source: Sending an ALTSVC frame with a specific stream ID indicates that the alternate service is associated with the origin of the given Http2Stream.
trans-unit.target: 发送具有特定流ID 的 ALTSVC 帧表示备用服务与给定 Http2Stream 的来源相关联。

trans-unit.source: Sending an Authorization header will override using the auth option to compute basic authentication.
trans-unit.target: 发送Authorization标头将覆盖使用 auth 选项来计算基本身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Sending multiple buffers might be faster or slower depending on the application and operating system. It is important to run benchmarks to determine the optimal strategy on a case-by-case basis. Generally speaking, however, sending multiple buffers is faster.
trans-unit.target: 发送多个缓冲区可能更快或更慢,这取决于应用程序和操作系统。重要的是要根据具体情况运行基准来确定最佳策略。不过,一般来说,发送多个缓冲区的速度更快。

trans-unit.source: Sends a PING frame to the connected HTTP/2 peer. A callback function must be provided. The method will return true if the PING was sent, false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 将 PING 帧发送到连接的HTTP / 2对等方。必须提供一个 callback 函数。如果发送了 PING ,则该方法将返回 true ，否则返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Sends a HTTP/1.1 100 Continue message to the client, indicating that the request body should be sent. See the 'checkContinue' event on Server.
trans-unit.target: 向客户端发送HTTP / 1.1 100 Continue消息，指示应发送请求正文。请参阅 Server 上的 'checkContinue' 事件。

trans-unit.source: Sends a HTTP/1.1 102 Processing message to the client, indicating that the request body should be sent.
trans-unit.target: 向客户机发送HTTP/1.1 102处理消息,说明应该发送请求体。

trans-unit.source: Sends a JavaScript value to the receiving side of this channel. value will be transferred in a way which is compatible with the HTML structured clone algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 将JavaScript值发送到此通道的接收端。 value 将以与HTML结构化克隆算法兼容的方式进行传输。

trans-unit.source: Sends a chunk of the body. By calling this method many times, a request body can be sent to a server — in that case it is suggested to use the ['Transfer-Encoding', 'chunked'] header line when creating the request.
trans-unit.target: 发送身体的一块。通过多次调用此方法，可以将请求主体发送到服务器-在这种情况下，建议在创建请求时使用 ['Transfer-Encoding', 'chunked'] 标头行。

trans-unit.source: Sends a regular file as the response. The path must specify a regular file or an 'error' event will be emitted on the Http2Stream object.
trans-unit.target: 发送常规文件作为响应。该 path 必须指定一个常规文件，否则将在 Http2Stream 对象上发出 'error' 事件。

trans-unit.source: Sends a response header to the request. The status code is a 3-digit HTTP status code, like 404. The last argument, headers, are the response headers.
trans-unit.target: 将响应标头发送到请求。状态代码是3位HTTP状态代码，例如 404 。最后一个参数 headers 是响应头。

trans-unit.source: Sends a response header to the request. The status code is a 3-digit HTTP status code, like 404. The last argument, headers, are the response headers. Optionally one can give a human-readable statusMessage as the second argument.
trans-unit.target: 将响应标头发送到请求。状态代码是3位HTTP状态代码，例如 404 。最后一个参数 headers 是响应头。可以选择提供一个人类可读的 statusMessage 作为第二个参数。

trans-unit.source: Sends a status 100 Continue to the client, indicating that the request body should be sent. See the 'checkContinue' event on Http2Server and Http2SecureServer.
trans-unit.target: 向客户端发送状态 100 Continue (继续)，指示应该发送请求正文。请参阅 Http2Server 和 Http2SecureServer 上的 'checkContinue' 事件。

trans-unit.source: Sends a trailing HEADERS frame to the connected HTTP/2 peer. This method will cause the Http2Stream to be immediately closed and must only be called after the 'wantTrailers' event has been emitted. When sending a request or sending a response, the options.waitForTrailers option must be set in order to keep the Http2Stream open after the final DATA frame so that trailers can be sent.
trans-unit.target: 将尾随的 HEADERS 帧发送到连接的HTTP / 2对等方。此方法将导致 Http2Stream 立即关闭，并且必须在发出 'wantTrailers' 事件之后才调用。在发送请求或发送响应时，必须设置 options.waitForTrailers 选项，以使 Http2Stream 在最终的 DATA 帧之后保持打开状态，以便可以发送预告片。

trans-unit.source: Sends an additional informational HEADERS frame to the connected HTTP/2 peer.
trans-unit.target: 向连接的HTTP / 2对等方发送附加的信息 HEADERS 帧。

trans-unit.source: Sends data on the socket. The second parameter specifies the encoding in the case of a string — it defaults to UTF8 encoding.
trans-unit.target: 在套接字上发送数据。第二个参数指定字符串形式的编码-默认为UTF8编码。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process to identify user-defined conditions.
trans-unit.target: 发送给一个进程,以确定用户定义的条件。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process to indicate a stack fault on a coprocessor.
trans-unit.target: 发送给进程以指示协处理器上的堆栈故障。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process to notify of a bad argument.
trans-unit.target: 送到一个过程中,通知一个不好的说法。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process to notify of a power failure.
trans-unit.target: 送到流程中通知停电。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process to notify of a segmentation fault.
trans-unit.target: 发送给进程,通知分段故障。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process to notify that it has attempted to perform an illegal, malformed, unknown, or privileged instruction.
trans-unit.target: 发送给进程,通知它试图执行非法的、错误的、未知的或有特权的指令。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process to notify that it has caused a bus error.
trans-unit.target: 发送给一个进程,通知它已经造成了一个总线错误。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process to notify that it has performed an illegal arithmetic operation.
trans-unit.target: 发送给一个进程,通知它进行了一次非法的运算。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process to request it to stop.
trans-unit.target: 送到一个进程中,请求它停止。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process to request termination.
trans-unit.target: 送到一个程序,要求终止。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process to request that it abort.
trans-unit.target: 发送给一个进程,要求它中止。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process to terminate it immediately.
trans-unit.target: 送到一个进程,立即终止它。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process when I/O is available.
trans-unit.target: 当I/O可用时,发送至进程。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process when a child process terminates.
trans-unit.target: 当一个子进程终止时,发送到进程。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process when a file lock has been lost.
trans-unit.target: 当文件锁丢失时,发送至进程。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process when a socket has urgent data to read.
trans-unit.target: 当一个套接字有紧急数据需要读取时,发送到一个进程。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process when a system timer elapses.
trans-unit.target: 当系统定时器过期时,发送至进程。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process when a system timer has elapsed.
trans-unit.target: 当系统定时器过期时,发送至进程。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process when a virtual timer has elapsed.
trans-unit.target: 当一个虚拟定时器过期时,发送至一个进程。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process when an exception has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 当发生异常时,发送至进程。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process when it grows a file larger than the maximum allowed.
trans-unit.target: 当一个进程增长的文件大于最大允许值时,发送到该进程。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process when it has attempted to write to a disconnected pipe.
trans-unit.target: 当一个进程试图向一个已断开的管道进行写入时,向其发送。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process when it has exceeded its limit on CPU usage.
trans-unit.target: 当一个进程的CPU使用量超过极限时,就会发送给它。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process when it reads from the TTY while in the background.
trans-unit.target: 当它在后台读取TTY时,发送到一个进程。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process when it writes to the TTY while in the background.
trans-unit.target: 当它在后台写到TTY时,发送到一个进程。

trans-unit.source: Sent to a process when the controlling terminal has changed its size.
trans-unit.target: 当控制终端的尺寸发生变化时,发送至进程。

trans-unit.source: Sent to indicate when a controlling terminal is closed or a parent process exits.
trans-unit.target: 当控制终端关闭或父进程退出时发出。

trans-unit.source: Sent to indicate when a user wishes to interrupt a process ((Ctrl+C)).
trans-unit.target: 发送以指示用户何时希望中断进程（ (Ctrl+C) ）。

trans-unit.source: Sent to indicate when a user wishes to interrupt a process.
trans-unit.target: 当用户希望中断一个进程时发出的指示。

trans-unit.source: Sent to indicate when a user wishes to terminate a process and perform a core dump.
trans-unit.target: 当用户希望终止一个进程并执行核心转储时发出。

trans-unit.source: Sent to instruct the operating system to continue a paused process.
trans-unit.target: 发送指示操作系统继续暂停的进程。

trans-unit.source: Sent to instruct the operating system to halt a process.
trans-unit.target: 发送指示操作系统停止进程。

trans-unit.target: 序列化一个JavaScript值,并将序列化的表示方式添加到内部缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Session Resumption
trans-unit.target: 会话恢复

trans-unit.source: Session ticket keys are cryptographic keys, and they must be stored securely. With TLS 1.2 and below, if they are compromised all sessions that used tickets encrypted with them can be decrypted. They should not be stored on disk, and they should be regenerated regularly.
trans-unit.target: 会话票证密钥是加密密钥，必须安全存储。在TLS 1.2及更低版本中，如果它们受到威胁，则可以解密所有使用票证加密的会话。它们不应存储在磁盘上，并且应定期重新生成。

trans-unit.source: Set tls.DEFAULT_MAX_VERSION to 'TLSv1.2'. Use to disable support for TLSv1.3.
trans-unit.target: 将 tls.DEFAULT_MAX_VERSION 设置为“ TLSv1.2”。用于禁用对TLSv1.3的支持。

trans-unit.source: Set initialDelay (in milliseconds) to set the delay between the last data packet received and the first keepalive probe. Setting 0 for initialDelay will leave the value unchanged from the default (or previous) setting.
trans-unit.target: 设置 initialDelay （以毫秒为单位）以设置接收到的最后一个数据包与第一个keepalive探测之间的延迟。设置 0 为 initialDelay 将离开从默认（先前）设置不变的值。

trans-unit.source: Set process.title on startup.
trans-unit.target: 在启动时设置 process.title 。

trans-unit.source: Set packageName to the substring of packageSpecifier until the first "/" separator or the end of the string.
trans-unit.target: 将packageName设置为packageSpecifier的子字符串，直到第一个“ /”分隔符或字符串的末尾。

trans-unit.source: Set packageName to the substring of packageSpecifier until the second "/" separator or the end of the string.
trans-unit.target: 将packageName设置为packageSpecifier的子字符串，直到第二个“ /”分隔符或字符串的末尾。

trans-unit.source: Set packagePath to "./" concatenated with packagePath.
trans-unit.target: 将packagePath设置为与packagePath串联的“ ./”。

trans-unit.source: Set packageSubpath to "." concatenated with the substring of packageSpecifier from the position at the length of packageName.
trans-unit.target: 将packageSubpath设置为“。” 从packageName长度的位置与packageSpecifier的子字符串连接在一起。

trans-unit.source: Set parentURL to the parent URL path of parentURL.
trans-unit.target: 集parentURL到父URL路径parentURL。

trans-unit.source: Set parentURL to the parent folder URL of parentURL.
trans-unit.target: 集parentURL来的父文件夹的网址parentURL。

trans-unit.source: Sets a single header value for headers object. If this header already exists in the to-be-sent headers, its value will be replaced. Use an array of strings here to send multiple headers with the same name. Non-string values will be stored without modification. Therefore, request.getHeader() may return non-string values. However, the non-string values will be converted to strings for network transmission.
trans-unit.target: 为标头对象设置单个标头值。如果此标头已存在于待发送标头中，则其值将被替换。在此处使用字符串数组发送具有相同名称的多个标头。非字符串值将被存储而无需修改。因此， request.getHeader() 可能返回非字符串值。但是，非字符串值将转换为用于网络传输的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Sets a single header value for implicit headers. If this header already exists in the to-be-sent headers, its value will be replaced. Use an array of strings here to send multiple headers with the same name.
trans-unit.target: 为隐式报头设置一个单一的报头值。如果这个头已经存在于要发送的头文件中,它的值将被替换。在这里使用一个字符串数组来发送具有相同名称的多个头信息。

trans-unit.source: Sets a single header value for implicit headers. If this header already exists in the to-be-sent headers, its value will be replaced. Use an array of strings here to send multiple headers with the same name. Non-string values will be stored without modification. Therefore, response.getHeader() may return non-string values. However, the non-string values will be converted to strings for network transmission.
trans-unit.target: 为隐式头设置单个头值。如果此标头已存在于待发送标头中，则其值将被替换。在此处使用字符串数组发送具有相同名称的多个标头。非字符串值将被存储而无需修改。因此， response.getHeader() 可能返回非字符串值。但是，非字符串值将转换为用于网络传输的字符串。

trans-unit.target: 设置或清除 IP_MULTICAST_LOOP 套接字选项。设置为 true 时，还将在本地接口上接收多播数据包。

trans-unit.source: Sets or clears the SO_BROADCAST socket option. When set to true, UDP packets may be sent to a local interface's broadcast address.
trans-unit.target: 设置或清除 SO_BROADCAST 套接字选项。设置为 true 时，UDP数据包可能会发送到本地接口的广播地址。

trans-unit.source: Sets or resets the signal for report generation (not supported on Windows). Default signal is SIGUSR2.
trans-unit.target: 设置或重置用于生成报告的信号（Windows不支持）。默认信号为 SIGUSR2 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Http2Stream's timeout value to msecs. If a callback is provided, then it is added as a listener on the 'timeout' event on the response object.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Http2Stream 的超时值，以 msecs 。如果提供了回调，则会将其作为侦听器添加到响应对象上的 'timeout' 事件中。

trans-unit.source: Sets the IP_MULTICAST_TTL socket option. While TTL generally stands for "Time to Live", in this context it specifies the number of IP hops that a packet is allowed to travel through, specifically for multicast traffic. Each router or gateway that forwards a packet decrements the TTL. If the TTL is decremented to 0 by a router, it will not be forwarded.
trans-unit.target: 设置 IP_MULTICAST_TTL 套接字选项。尽管TTL通常代表“生存时间”，但在这种情况下，它指定允许数据包通过的IP跳数，特别是对于多播流量。转发数据包的每个路由器或网关都会减少TTL。如果路由器将TTL递减为0，则不会转发该TTL。

trans-unit.source: Sets the IP_TTL socket option. While TTL generally stands for "Time to Live", in this context it specifies the number of IP hops that a packet is allowed to travel through. Each router or gateway that forwards a packet decrements the TTL. If the TTL is decremented to 0 by a router, it will not be forwarded. Changing TTL values is typically done for network probes or when multicasting.
trans-unit.target: 设置 IP_TTL 套接字选项。尽管TTL通常代表“生存时间”，但在这种情况下，它指定允许数据包通过的IP跳数。转发数据包的每个路由器或网关都会减少TTL。如果路由器将TTL递减为0，则不会转发该TTL。更改TTL值通常是在网络探针或多播时完成的。

trans-unit.source: Sets the SO_RCVBUF socket option. Sets the maximum socket receive buffer in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 设置 SO_RCVBUF 套接字选项。设置最大套接字接收缓冲区（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the SO_SNDBUF socket option. Sets the maximum socket send buffer in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 设置 SO_SNDBUF 套接字选项。设置最大套接字发送缓冲区（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Diffie-Hellman private key. If the encoding argument is provided, privateKey is expected to be a string. If no encoding is provided, privateKey is expected to be a Buffer, TypedArray, or DataView.
trans-unit.target: 设置Diffie-Hellman私钥。如果提供了 encoding 参数，则 privateKey 应该是字符串。如果没有提供 encoding ，则 privateKey 应该是 Buffer ， TypedArray 或 DataView 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Diffie-Hellman public key. If the encoding argument is provided, publicKey is expected to be a string. If no encoding is provided, publicKey is expected to be a Buffer, TypedArray, or DataView.
trans-unit.target: 设置Diffie-Hellman公钥。如果提供了 encoding 参数，则 publicKey 应该是字符串。如果没有提供 encoding ，则 publicKey 应该是 Buffer ， TypedArray 或 DataView 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the EC Diffie-Hellman private key. If encoding is provided, privateKey is expected to be a string; otherwise privateKey is expected to be a Buffer, TypedArray, or DataView.
trans-unit.target: 设置EC Diffie-Hellman私钥。如果提供了 encoding ，则 privateKey 应该是字符串；否则 privateKey 应该是 Buffer ， TypedArray 或 DataView 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the EC Diffie-Hellman public key. If encoding is provided publicKey is expected to be a string; otherwise a Buffer, TypedArray, or DataView is expected.
trans-unit.target: 设置EC Diffie-Hellman公钥。如果提供了 encoding 则 publicKey 应为字符串；否则，为false。否则，将使用 Buffer ， TypedArray 或 DataView 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value in the URLSearchParams object associated with name to value. If there are any pre-existing name-value pairs whose names are name, set the first such pair's value to value and remove all others. If not, append the name-value pair to the query string.

trans-unit.source: Similarly to libuv handles, thread-safe functions can be "referenced" and "unreferenced". A "referenced" thread-safe function will cause the event loop on the thread on which it is created to remain alive until the thread-safe function is destroyed. In contrast, an "unreferenced" thread-safe function will not prevent the event loop from exiting. The APIs napi_ref_threadsafe_function and napi_unref_threadsafe_function exist for this purpose.
trans-unit.target: 与libuv句柄类似，线程安全函数可以“引用”和“未引用”。“引用的”线程安全功能将导致在其上创建事件的线程上的事件循环保持活动状态，直到销毁线程安全功能为止。相反，“未引用”线程安全函数将不会阻止事件循环的退出。 napi_ref_threadsafe_function ，存在API napi_ref_threadsafe_function和 napi_unref_threadsafe_function 。

trans-unit.target: 同样， _error 将引用最后一次看到的错误（如果存在）。将 _error 显式设置为一个值将禁用此行为。

trans-unit.source: Since most requests are GET requests without bodies, Node.js provides this convenience method. The only difference between this method and http.request() is that it sets the method to GET and calls req.end() automatically. The callback must take care to consume the response data for reasons stated in http.ClientRequest section.
trans-unit.target: 由于大多数请求都是没有主体的GET请求，因此Node.js提供了这种便捷方法。此方法与 http.request() 之间的唯一区别是，它将方法设置为GET并自动调用 req.end() 。由于 http.ClientRequest 部分中所述的原因，回调必须谨慎使用消耗响应数据。

trans-unit.source: Since there are no browsers known that support unencrypted HTTP/2, the use of http2.createSecureServer() is necessary when communicating with browser clients.
trans-unit.target: 由于没有已知的浏览器支持未加密的HTTP / 2，因此在与浏览器客户端进行通信时必须使用 http2.createSecureServer() 。

trans-unit.source: Single process servers need no specific implementation to use session tickets. To use session tickets across server restarts or load balancers, servers must all have the same ticket keys. There are three 16-byte keys internally, but the tls API exposes them as a single 48-byte buffer for convenience.
trans-unit.target: 单进程服务器不需要特定的实现就可以使用会话票据。要跨服务器重启或负载均衡器使用会话票据,服务器必须拥有相同的票据密钥。内部有三个16字节的密钥,但为了方便,tls API将它们公开为一个48字节的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: SlowBuffer
trans-unit.target: SlowBuffer

trans-unit.source: Smaller fragment sizes decrease the buffering latency on the client: larger fragments are buffered by the TLS layer until the entire fragment is received and its integrity is verified; large fragments can span multiple roundtrips and their processing can be delayed due to packet loss or reordering. However, smaller fragments add extra TLS framing bytes and CPU overhead, which may decrease overall server throughput.
trans-unit.target: 较小的碎片会降低客户端的缓冲延迟:较大的碎片会被TLS层缓冲,直到收到整个碎片并验证其完整性;较大的碎片可以跨越多个往返,其处理可能会因为数据包丢失或重新排序而延迟。然而,较小的碎片会增加额外的TLS成帧字节和CPU开销,这可能会降低服务器的整体吞吐量。

The mentioned APIs now use the WHATWG URL parser that requires strictly valid URLs. Passing an invalid URL is deprecated and support will be removed in the future.

trans-unit.source: Some resources depend on garbage collection for cleanup, so if a reference is made to the resource object passed to init it is possible that destroy will never be called, causing a memory leak in the application. If the resource does not depend on garbage collection, then this will not be an issue.
trans-unit.target: 一些资源依赖于垃圾回收进行清理，因此，如果对传递给 init 的 resource 对象进行引用，则有可能永远不会调用 destroy ，从而导致应用程序中的内存泄漏。如果资源不依赖于垃圾回收，那么这将不是问题。

trans-unit.source: Stops the server from accepting new connections and keeps existing connections. This function is asynchronous, the server is finally closed when all connections are ended and the server emits a 'close' event. The optional callback will be called once the 'close' event occurs.
